DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM.synopsis: The player has never spoken to Isobel before starting the assault on Moonrise. The Butler appears in front of the player on the bridge to Moonrise to remind the Dark Urge player that they must kill Isobel if they want to please Bhaal.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_53.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_53.text: It is rather loathly of Sceleritas to disrupt your romp, but I cannot allow the Master to forget duty, and keep carousing like this.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_3.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_3.text: I've been running hither and thither trying to speak with you again! But Master does rather shuffle about a lot. An old Butler's knees can't keep up.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_34.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_34.text: Proof is required you are worthy of the inheritance you are very close to receiving.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_50.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_50.text: A perfect crime awaits. You must go and kill this target, and you will be rewarded dearly.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_15.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_15.text: The Moonmaiden Isobel... she is all but alone now... I have been watching her.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_12.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_12.text: It will be easy. Her protectors have left. She thinks she can defend herself. She cannot, not against you.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_2.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_2.text: Be a goodly sinner, and dash off to kill her posthaste... If you don't, I worry greatly for your future.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_17.text: Have you forgotten? Whenever this frail carcass perishes, you shall always be sent a fresh Sceleritas.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_10.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_10.text: You must have killed me hundreds of times since you were a youngling. I hope there will be hundreds more...

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_14.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_14.text: What will happen, if I don't do it?

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_27.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_27.text: I am not certain. You were never disobedient before your little accident.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_31.text: You may kill in your sleep again. You may be executed. You might even be disinherited.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_44.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_44.text: The Inn of Last Light. I can understand why you did not linger there. 'Tis rather a hovel.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_20.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_20.text: But hovel or not - there is exquisite killing to be had there. Efficient killing!

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_32.text: This tower will still be here for you to bombard when you return.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_26.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_26.text: Why do you want me to kill her?

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_52.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_52.text: Don't mistake me, Master, I want you to kill everyone.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_16.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_16.text: This is simply a matter of royal principle. We hear of a darling thing shining a light in the darkness? We kill her!

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_54.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_54.text: If you do not, it will be terribly embarrassing for the both of us.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_40.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_40.text: I don't want to harm her. I will save this cursed land.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_28.text: What has come over you? You cut such a dapper figure, slashing apart the Grove...

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_9.text: Peasants love grovelling afore those of good breeding. The shameful poor Isobel protects want to die by your royal hand.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_43.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_43.text: I'll go to her with knives.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_24.text: You think Lord Ketheric is the worst foe you could face?

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_56.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_56.text: The Urge, Master... Fear the Urge.
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_56.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_48.speaker: Narrator
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_48.text: *In the depths of your liver, the bile salt bubbles, as if letting out a knowing chuckle.*

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_23.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_23.text: If you spite your loving Butler now, I shall be forced to report back home that you have been naughty.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_19.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_19.text: I'm never obeying you. Do you hear me? Never!

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_13.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_13.text: This isn't me. I am not what I used to be.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_30.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_30.text: I'm not doing anything unless you reveal my past.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_47.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_47.text: It will come soon. Very soon. But we must impress our betters before you can be trusted with your old station...

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_25.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_25.text: Please, my Liege. Do not disappoint your Father... Kill the cleric at once - or else.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_21.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_21.text: Apologies for my tardiness. I'll get right to it.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_37.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_37.text: Now is the perfect time to finally kill you.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_42.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_42.text: Oh! Do! Do! If this frail carcass ever perishes, you will always be sent a fresh Butler.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_7.text: We shouldn't let you get too distracted. Make sure you kill her afterwards. And soon.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_29.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_29.context: InternalNodeContext: Leads to the same combat state as if you attacked him at the Bhaal Temple MainDoor scene - he doesn't resist and gets the 'happy' state

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_38.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_38.text: I just want to be left alone. I'm not doing this.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_51.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_51.text: I have already indulged in one death here... but one more never hurts!

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_11.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_11.text: You've employed some skilled servants, my Liege! You murdered me very well! I cannot wait to see you unleash your minions upon the tower.

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_35.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_35.text: Oh, precious Liege. Look at you! All grown up and storming such a large tower! And with such wanton force!
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_35.context: NodeContext: affection, like to a child

DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_41.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
DarkUrgeButlerReminder_AOM_41.text: You murdered me very well! And look at you! About to storm a whole tower!
